title: Huckberry Stretch Selvedge Denim Jeans for Men - 11.7 oz Mens Jeans with 1% Stretch, Copper Rivets- Year-Round Men Jeans
description: 11.7 oz. selvedge denim ideal for year-round wear
1% stretch is the perfect amount for immediate comfort
Selvedge denim is woven on shuttle looms to prevent unraveling and fraying—it's no wonder denim enthusiasts call it a favorite
Lived-in medium wash inspired by our favorite vintage pieces
Heritage details throughout: copper rivets, sturdy contrast stitching, and suede F&T patch
